markdownRemark.html:
Overview

The project was a solution to Sunnyside agency landing page challenge. I decided that my portfolio of projects is lacking something good-looking and well designed so coding that landing page would be a good experience and asset.

The challenge

This was my first project using Tailwind CSS. Utility and Mobile First CSS was a challenge itself. Nevertheless, the experience was really good and allowed me to create this project in a little more than 24 hours.
